content: **from the website ** heirloom quality crochet lace pattern as featured in crochet today magazine creates a beautiful gift to welcome the new baby **skill level ** experienced **supplies ** 3 light tlc® baby art e511 6 ounce/490 yard skein 4 skeins 5737 powder pink yarn needle **gauge ** rnds 1-6 = 4 5 across check your gauge use any size hook to obtain the gauge
